subject: Speed Skating
lead_paragraph: Shani Davis of the United States won his second speedskating title in three days, edging Denny Morrison of Canada in the 1,000 meters in Heerenveen, Netherlands.Davis finished in 1:08.63. Morrison was 0.12 behind and Simon Kuipers of the Netherlands was third. Paulien van Deutekom of the Netherlands won the women’s 1,000 in 1:16.77. Fei Wang of China was second (1:17.09) and Ingeborg Kroon of the Netherlands was third.
